item.title: Mac OS Catalina X ZSH Shell
item.description: Intro With Mac OS Catalina, Apple use ZSH as default shell, but it only apply to newly created account. For existing user accounts, it is required to upgrade it manually Change the Default shell to ZSH Execute following command to change the default shell chsh -s /bin/zsh Install oh-my-zsh oh-my-zsh is a open source, community-driven framework for managing zsh configuration. sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)"
